Autumn Leaves [[posterous-content:fLeX6VcwU7vIixcSj3GY]]

the weather is dreary here. it has been cold and raining since saturday.
i'm kind of disappointed because i had wanted to take a whole bunch of pics of autumn leaves against the light blue sky last week with my camera phone on the walk from my dorm to the rehearsal hall.
but firstly, i haven't gotten a new phone yet. secondly, the sky is gloomy and grim.

anyway, here's some consolation in the mean time.

Autumn Leaves - Nat King Cole - a vocal version
The falling leaves drift by the window
The autumn leaves of red and gold
I see your lips, the summer kisses
The sun-burned hands I used to hold

Since you went away the days grow long
And soon I'll hear old winter's song
But I miss you most of all my darling
When autumn leaves start to fall


Jazz autumn leaves - Keith Jarret

and a picturesque version.
